title: Spacious Sun-Filled 3BR in Victorian with Private Yard Includes All Ut
posting_body: This elegant second floor Newtonville apartment features tall ceilings, hardwood floors, large windows many with a welcoming southern orientation.
The kitchen has a gas range with electric oven and is fully applianced.
The dining room opens to the kitchen which is perfect for casual entertaining.
The two larger bedrooms are well-separated and one has a private 1/2 bath making this unit particularly attractive for two individuals to share.
There is an in-unit washer and dryer and tandem parking for 2 cars, 1 in the garage.
For information or to arrange a showing, please call owner:  617-530-0916.
Rent includes all utilities plus wifi.
The house is close to the center of Newtonville, one of the 17 villages of the city of Newton situated mid-way between Newton Corner and West Newton.
It is a short walk to the commuter rail to Boston, many bus lines, Whole Foods and numerous restaurants.
Newtonville is also close Waltham and Watertown and other Metrowest communities.
